items.text: short of a length, punched down to long-on
driven to sweeper cover
comes down the track and meets the pitch before driving to wide long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, 1 run

items.preText: r: "Get more fielders around the bat and build some pressure"
items.text: hangs back ad opens the face to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: good length, spins past the outside edge as he presses forward
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full on middle, driven back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: advances and adjusts to the shorter length by flaying it to the sweeper at cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, more work for sweeper as it's driven out
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, slides in with the arm on off, backs away and punches through the covers
full and sliding on leg, pushed down to long-on
comes down the track and drills it to extra cover
flicks a fullish one from outside off to long-on
fuller, angling in on off, drilled back off the inside of the bat
driven to cover
sliding on leg, wears it on the pad as he tries to flick and the ball goes to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: comes charging down and pushes it out into the off sde
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: fuller, presses forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: stays back to a length ball that keeps low and punches towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: short of a length, this time he stands tall and punches to the right of the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: defended off the inside of the bat into the on side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: full on off, driven to wide long-off
advances, meets the pitch and drives to mid-on where Mashrafe makes a diving stop
fuller, driven to extra cover
